Class ListPopupImpl

  • java.lang.Object

extends WizardPopup
implements ListPopup, NextStepHandler

      • handleSelect

        public void handleSelect(boolean handleFinalChoices)
        Description copied from interface: ListPopup
        Handles the selection of the currently focused item in the popup step.
        Specified by:
        handleSelect in interface ListPopup
        Parameters:
        handleFinalChoices - If true, the action of the focused item is always executed (as if Enter was pressed). If false, and the focused item has a submenu, the submenu is opened (as if the right arrow key was pressed).
